column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////i went here with a group of ppl. It was pleasant
column2: although very crowded for a wednesday night (which made me think
column3: wow this place must be good) we each ordered two dishes and passed all of them around the table
column4: i like the idea of ordering as you stay hungry
column5: and the food was really good. I would say try the braised lamb
column6: reminded me of a middle eastern dish i had in egypt
column7: sweet and especially loved the peanuts they had on top. unusual but delicious.
